topic.title: Editing XML Schema in Text Editing Mode

body.p: The Text editing mode can be used for editing XML Schema in a source editing mode. It offers powerful content completion support, a synchronized Outline view, and multiple refactoring actions. The Outline view has two display modes: the standard outline mode and the components mode.
A diagram of the XML Schema can be presented side by side with the text. To activate the diagram presentation, select the Show Full Model XML Schema diagram option in the Diagram preferences page.
